summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of GuessIT football prediction app. All backend APIs functional, frontend rendering correctly, Football API integration working with live match data display.

ui_bugs.issue: Theme toggle button not found with expected data-testid selector
ui_bugs.note: Theme toggle icon visible in header, functionality may work with different selector

passed_tests: API root endpoint returns GuessIt message
Football matches endpoint returns 120 matches with correct structure
Auth register endpoint working with validation
Auth login endpoint working with error handling
Homepage loads with match data from Football API
Login page renders with all form fields and Google OAuth
Register page renders with password validation requirements
League filter chips are visible and clickable
Tab navigation working (Popular, Top Live, Soon, Ended)
Match cards display team names, scores, and vote buttons
Vote buttons are clickable and responsive
Live updates status indicator shows WebSocket connection
